name: My Fairy Princess
description:
***** ON SALE! 50% OFF for a limited time! *****

Finally, a 3D dress up app where your character moves and dances in the outfit that you pick out for her!

Tap different items on your Fairy Princess and watch them change. Swipe your finger across her to make her twirl. Swipe up or down to make her fly. Tap the sides of her to see different viewing angles. Give her a shake to change the background scene. Mix and match numerous beautiful items to make the perfect Fairy Princess, outfit, and scene:

* Dresses
* Shoes
* Crowns
* Wings
* Backgrounds
* Different Fairy Princesses

Your fully interactive princess will acknowledge and respond to the outfit you pick out for her through animation!

The simple and intuitive interface is especially good for little kids. 'My Fairy Princess' provides endless entertainment for anyone who loves Princesses, Fairies, or dress up games.

With enough positive feedback, updates will be on the way - including more clothes, accessories, and backgrounds!
